title: Roof Pitch: Rise/Run to Degrees
summary: Convert rise/run pitch into degrees for set-out.
whenToUse: Use when plans specify pitch ratio and you need an angle.
steps: Measure rise and run for one module.
Divide rise by run to get the slope ratio.
commonMistakes: Entering total span instead of run.
Using degrees when the calculator expects ratio.
siteTips: If pitch is given as 1:4, enter rise 1 and run 4.
Check with a pitch gauge for quick confirmation.
verification: A 1:4 pitch should be a bit over 14°.
